attributes.action: Refuse to take suspected terrorists from Guantanamo Bay coming to Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As we already have terrorists sympathisers in the UK it would be ludicrous to take more especially as they have no connection with Britain.
If these people were to be accepted it would put the British people even more at risk and would be a massive slap in the face for our troops who have / are doing their best to protect us from these very people.
The British people do not want them and do not want to keep them at our expense it is in fact a slap in the face for the general public as well.
We cannot accept all and sundries terrorists just to appease a new president.
